about.title: About Me
about.subTitle:
Front-End Developer
based in Hyderabad, Telangana
about.content: I am a passionate Front-end Developer based in Hyderabad, Telangana. My focus is on creating dynamic and user-friendly web applications using the latest technologies.

workInfo.title: Next Education
workInfo.subTitle: Engineer (R & D Team)
tasks: Fixed bugs and stabilized digital whiteboard, gaining expertise in fabric.js.
Contributed to an Angular Electron project, exploring Node.js child processes and commands like robocopy.
Enhanced an Annotation Module, improving image/PDF readability on smaller screens with features like pinch zoom and panning.
Provided client support for Multiple Learning Tools, which includes speaking, writing, and computer science tools.
